intro:
What if she had a Cinderella-like experience?
She panics after being courted by these superstars!
description:
Misora, our heroine, is a refined young lady working as an office lady. But her life takes a sudden turn after the passing of her beloved mother. Her father, Manabu Tsukaji, remarries a graduate student named Michiko—who soon begins to treat Misora like Cinderella.

What begins as a tale of hardship slowly transforms into an unbelievably heartwarming Cinderella story. As the plot unfolds, no one is left unhappy, and Misora ends up so blissfully happy, she almost panics!

4 Love Interests!
With a simple structure and only one character choice at the final branching ending, this game is perfect for otome game beginners. No tricky routes—just sweet, romantic moments with your very own Super Darling (aka Supa-Dari)!

Features:

12 stunning CG stills!

Enjoy both a CG Gallery and a Sound Room featuring original music tracks!

Prepare to fall in love in this sugar-sweet romantic adventure!
